displayName: Ensure ASC Default policy setting "Monitor Storage Blob Encryption" is not "Disabled"
rationale: When this setting is enabled, any new data in Azure Blobs and Files will be encrypted.
recommended_action:
1. Navigate to Azure Policy
2. On Policy "Overview" blade, Click on Policy ASC Default
 (Subscription:Subscription_ID)
3. On "ASC Default" blade, Click on Edit Assignments
4. In section PARAMETERS, Set Monitor Storage Blob Encryption to Audit or any
other available value than Disabled
5. Click Save
ruleNames: Ensure ASC default policy setting 'Monitor Storage Blob Encryption' is not disabled
